key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to raw material price volatility and disruptions
Economic sensitivity tied to the construction industry
Regulatory risks from changes in building codes or environmental regulations
Intense competition in the construction materials industry
Geopolitical risks from international market expansion
controversies: Involvement in legal disputes, including intellectual property litigation and insurance-related cases
environmental_issues: Need for compliance with evolving environmental regulations and sustainable manufacturing practices
social_issues: Commitment to employee safety and eco-friendly product lines
governance_issues: Ongoing investment in ESG practices and alignment with global standards
